```py
test_stat <- data |> 
  specify(formula = sleep_performance ~ alcohol) |> 
  calculate(
    stat = "diff in means",
    order = c("No", "Yes")
  )
```

```py
set.seed(42) #Setting seed for reproducibility

null_distribution <- data |> 
  specify(formula = sleep_performance ~ alcohol) |> 
  hypothesize(null = "independence") |> 
  generate(reps = 1000, type = "permute") |> 
  calculate(
    stat = "diff in means",
    order = c("No", "Yes")
  )
```
